ftp-incoming-port.help: Accept incoming FTP-over-HTTP requests on one or more ports (0 - 65535, default = 0; use the same as HTTP).
ftp-incoming-port.name: ftp-incoming-port

ftp-over-http.help: Enable to proxy FTP-over-HTTP sessions sent from a web browser.
ftp-over-http.name: ftp-over-http

http-incoming-port.help: Accept incoming HTTP requests on one or more ports (0 - 65535, default = 8080).
http-incoming-port.name: http-incoming-port

https-incoming-port.help: Accept incoming HTTPS requests on one or more ports (0 - 65535, default = 0, use the same as HTTP).
https-incoming-port.name: https-incoming-port

https-replacement-message.help: Enable/disable sending the client a replacement message for HTTPS requests.
https-replacement-message.name: https-replacement-message

options.help: Display a replacement message for HTTPS requests.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not display a replacement message for HTTPS requests.
options.name: disable

incoming-ip.help: Restrict the explicit HTTP proxy to only accept sessions from this IP address. An interface must have this IP address.
incoming-ip.name: incoming-ip

incoming-ip6.help: Restrict the explicit web proxy to only accept sessions from this IPv6 address. An interface must have this IPv6 address.
incoming-ip6.name: incoming-ip6

ipv6-status.help: Enable/disable allowing an IPv6 web proxy destination in policies and all IPv6 related entries in this command.
ipv6-status.name: ipv6-status

options.help: Enable allowing an IPv6 web proxy destination.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable allowing an IPv6 web proxy destination.
options.name: disable

message-upon-server-error.help: Enable/disable displaying a replacement message when a server error is detected.
message-upon-server-error.name: message-upon-server-error

options.help: Display a replacement message when a server error is detected.
options.name: enable

options.help: Do not display a replacement message when a server error is detected.
options.name: disable

outgoing-ip.help: Outgoing HTTP requests will have this IP address as their source address. An interface must have this IP address.
outgoing-ip.name: outgoing-ip

outgoing-ip6.help: Outgoing HTTP requests will leave this IPv6. Multiple interfaces can be specified. Interfaces must have these IPv6 addresses.
outgoing-ip6.name: outgoing-ip6

pac-file-data.help: PAC file contents enclosed in quotes (maximum of 256K bytes).
pac-file-data.name: pac-file-data

pac-file-server-port.help: Port number that PAC traffic from client web browsers uses to connect to the explicit web proxy (0 - 65535, default = 0; use the same as HTTP).
pac-file-server-port.name: pac-file-server-port

pac-file-server-status.help: Enable/disable Proxy Auto-Configuration (PAC) for users of this explicit proxy profile.
pac-file-server-status.name: pac-file-server-status

pac-file-data.help: PAC file contents enclosed in quotes (maximum of 256K bytes).
pac-file-data.name: pac-file-data

pref-dns-result.help: Prefer resolving addresses using the configured IPv4 or IPv6 DNS server (default = ipv4).
pref-dns-result.name: pref-dns-result

realm.help: Authentication realm used to identify the explicit web proxy (maximum of 63 characters).
realm.name: realm

sec-default-action.help: Accept or deny explicit web proxy sessions when no web proxy firewall policy exists.
sec-default-action.name: sec-default-action

options.help: Accept requests. All explicit web proxy traffic is accepted whether there is an explicit web proxy policy or not.
options.name: accept

options.help: Deny requests unless there is a matching explicit web proxy policy.
options.name: deny

socks-incoming-port.help: Accept incoming SOCKS proxy requests on one or more ports (0 - 65535, default = 0; use the same as HTTP).
socks-incoming-port.name: socks-incoming-port

ssl-algorithm.help: Relative strength of encryption algorithms accepted in HTTPS deep scan: high, medium, or low.
ssl-algorithm.name: ssl-algorithm

options.help: High encrption. Allow only AES and ChaCha.
options.name: high

options.help: Medium encryption. Allow AES, ChaCha, 3DES, and RC4.
options.name: medium

options.help: Low encryption. Allow AES, ChaCha, 3DES, RC4, and DES.
options.name: low

status.help: Enable/disable the explicit Web proxy for HTTP and HTTPS session.
status.name: status

strict-guest.help: Enable/disable strict guest user checking by the explicit web proxy.
strict-guest.name: strict-guest

unknown-http-version.help: How to handle HTTP sessions that do not comply with HTTP 0.9, 1.0, or 1.1.
unknown-http-version.name: unknown-http-version

options.help: Reject or tear down HTTP sessions that do not use HTTP 0.9, 1.0, or 1.1.
options.name: reject

options.help: Assume all HTTP sessions comply with HTTP 0.9, 1.0, or 1.1. If a session uses a different HTTP version, it may not parse correctly and the connection may be lost.
options.name: best-effort
